articles.title: Gary Gaines, coach made famous by 'Friday Night Lights,' dies at age 73
articles.description: Gary Gaines, coach of the Texas high school football team made famous by "Friday Night Lights," has died at age 73.
articles.content:
LUBBOCK, Texas -- Gary Gaines, coach of the Texas high school football team made famous in the book and movie "Friday Night Lights," has died. He was 73.
